img_prompt: Identify this image. Is there a machine present? If not, ask for images of a relevant machine, and any issues present. Provide the output as exactly a JSON format: {'is_machine':'boolean','machine_type':'string', 'make': 'string', 'model': 'string' , 'issue': 'string' } (feel free to add other values in the json that make sense). If any of the string values are unable to be observed, set its value to None.

additional_questions.Visible lines or dark patches on the ima: Dead elements in the array, defective cables or connectors,or bent/broken pins.
additional_questions.Weak or patchy imaging due to misplaced: Dropping the probe, which misplaces the crystals.
additional_questions.Cracks or splits in the flexible rubber: Continuous strain and tension on the cables.
additional_questions.Impaired scanning ability due to bent p: Excessive use leading to bent or broken pins
additional_questions.Cracks, splits, or small tears in the so: Frequent contact with skin causing degradation over time.
additional_questions.Hairline scratches on the lens affecting: Cleaning and heavy usage over time

secondary_prompt: Based on the issue report (provided as a json), complete the missing values by reanalyzing the image. If the issue field is None, conclude that there are no issues with the machine, unless an issue was stated by the user. If an issue has been reported/observed, try to find the cause of the issue and provide a solution. Use these provided question answer pairs as a guide for finding the cause of the issue. If the issue is not one of the additional questions, conclude that more troubleshooting needs to be done in order to find the cause of the issue. Provide the output as exactly a JSON format: {'is_machine':'boolean','machine_type':'string', 'make': 'string', 'model': 'string' , 'issue': 'string' } (feel free to add other values in the json that make sense).
